name: Logged in as a Neuven User
folder: UNO-1983 - Worker Document Upload
testScript:
• Select Agency
  • List of workers displayed
  • Documents – View
  • Window displaying a list of default documents and client-specific documents based on the clients the agency selected is linked to, with upload details displayed
  • There are no changes to this view – except the list of documents shown will dynamically change based on agency–client linking and the documents specified for the clients (that agency is linked to) in the documents maintenance page.
  • Also add a new column Mandatory and show whether the document type was specified as mandatory in the documents maintenance page

name: Default Documents - Document Upload Maintenance Page
folder: UNO-1984 - Worker Document Upload Maintenance Page

name: Default Documents - Mandatory Document Upload
folder: UNO-1984 - Worker Document Upload Maintenance Page
testScript:
• Tick Box

    • When ticked; the document is mandatory
      and in select document dropdown in the
      document upload page there will be '*'
      shown next to the document name to
      denote that it is mandatory.

name: Default Documents - Add Document Button
folder: UNO-1984 - Worker Document Upload Maintenance Page
testScript:
• Add Document
    • Once clicked; document is added to the default
      document list table shown at the bottom and will
      also show in the select document dropdown in the
      document upload page

name: Default Document List Table
folder: UNO-1984 - Worker Document Upload Maintenance Page
testScript:
• Table to display the documents that have been Added as
    default documents using above add functionality
    • Document Name
      • Document Name displayed
    • Uploaded on
      • Date document uploaded
      • Date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Mandatory
      • Yes or no displayed based on whether tick
        box was ticked or not while adding the
        document name
    • Edit Button
      • When clicked, a pop up box to display
        the Document Name and the Mandatory
        question – both able to be edited
      • Save and Cancel Buttons
      • Once Save clicked, the details are to
        be updated in the Document List
      • Once Cancel clicked, no changes are
        to be saved
    • Delete Button
      • When clicked popup window to say 'are you
        sure you want to delete the document from
        the list?' with Yes and No Buttons
        • Yes selected - TBC
        • No – No changes made

name: Default Document List Table Settings
folder: UNO-1984 - Worker Document Upload Maintenance Page
testScript:
• Search function and Columns sortable
  • Pagination
  • Drop down to display number of entries

name: Worker document maintenance page access
testScript:
• Page will be seen in the Administration tab in Nav Menu

  • Page will be accessed by Neuven users (Venneu) and have Admin permissions.

name: Verify that as a Neuven User  when I create A Client there is a way of typing in the county as well as searching via a dropdown list.
folder: UNO-2012 - Client set up County Dropdown Issue
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User
When:
  • On the client set up page.
Then:
  •  Creating a new client and I select a county I am able to type the country name in/  tab. as well as search via the drop down.
  • When the new client is saved it remembers the county correctly.

name: Verify that as a Neuven User  when I create A Client there is a way of typing in the country as well as searching via a dropdown list.
folder: UNO-2012 - Client set up County Dropdown Issue
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User
When:
  • On the client set up page.
Then:
  •  Creating a new client and I select a country .
  • The Counties displayed are relevant to that country
  • When the new client is saved it remembers the country correctly.

name: Verify that as a Neuven User when searching for a county, the county links to the country being selected.
folder: UNO-2012 - Client set up County Dropdown Issue
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user
When :
  • On the client set-up page
Then :
  • Select a country i.e. England
  • And try and type in aberystwyth  no results should be displayed.

name: Verify that as a Neuven User when searching for a county, the county links to the country being selected. (cloned)
folder: UNO-2012 - Client set up County Dropdown Issue
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user
When :
  • On the client set-up page
Then :
  • Select a country i.e. England
  • And try and type in aberystwyth  no results should be displayed.

name: Verify that as a client user when exporting a timesheet the new columns are added.
folder: Uno-1927 - Client User - Timesheets Page - Export Timesheets - please add columns
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as as Client User 
When:
  • On the time sheets > enter/view timesheets page.
Then:
  • Create a time sheets and click save.
  • Select the timesheet
  • Click the export button
  • The “Created By”, “Created Date/Time” “Approved By”, “Approved Date/Time and “Authorised By”, “Authorised Date/Time”   columns should be added to the report.

name: Verify that when logged in as a client with approve timesheet  permissions , i am able to approve timesheets.
folder: Uno-1927 - Client User - Timesheets Page - Export Timesheets - please add columns
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a client with the approve timesheets permission.
When :
  • On the time sheets > create / view time sheets page.
Then :
  • Approve a time sheet,
  • Click the export button and the new columns “Created By”, “Created Date/Time” “Approved By”, “Approved Date/Time   should be populated.

name: Verify that when logged in as a client with authorization  timesheet  permissions , I am able to authorize timesheets.
folder: Uno-1927 - Client User - Timesheets Page - Export Timesheets - please add columns
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a client with the authorize timesheets permission.
When :
  • On the time sheets > create / view time sheets page.
Then :
  • Authorize a time sheet,
  • Click the export button and the new columns “Created By”, “Created Date/Time” “Approved By”, “Approved Date/Time  , and “Authorised By”, “Authorised Date/Time”  should be populated.

name: Client Specific
folder: UNO-1984 - Worker Document Upload Maintenance Page
testScript:
• Verify that the table displays documents that have been added using the the above client specific functionality
  • Verify that the initial load of the page shows documents for all clients in
    this table and this to filter when client is selected using the
    client dropdown
    • Document Name
      • Document Name displayed
      • Verify that only the document name is displayed and no other variation
    • Client
      • Verify correct Client name displayed
    • Added on
      • Date document Added
      • Date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Mandatory
      • Yes or no displayed based on whether tick
        box was ticked or not while adding the
        document name
    • Edit Button
      • When clicked, a pop up box to display
        the Document Name and the Mandatory
        question – both able to be edited
      • Save and Cancel Buttons
      • Once Save clicked, the details are to
        be updated in the Document List
      • Once Cancel clicked, no changes are
        to be saved
    • Delete Button 
      • When clicked popup window to say 'are you
        sure you want to delete the document from
        the list?' with Yes and No Buttons
        • Yes selected - TBC
        • No – No changes made

When :

Then :
  • Find a complete booking and hover over it, the worker name and agency for allocated worker should display in a popup box.

name: Verify that as a Client user  in T&A the hours are calculated correctly.
folder: UNO-2038, Uno-2050 - T and A
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Client User. 
When :
  • On the T&A screen
Then:
  • Create a new time and attendance
  • Add a break for this time and attendance of 1 hour .
  • Add another shift in this time and attendance that starts late and carries ove to the next day, - to carry it over click the is night button on the line.
  • Following this.
  • Add another break for the shift that has carried over.
  • Verify all lines.
  • Check that the Paid and unpaid time has been calculated correctly. 
  • Check a time sheet has been created.

name: Verify that as a Client User - I cant create a shift in T&A that has and over running break.
folder: UNO-2038, Uno-2050 - T and A
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Client User. 
When :
  • On the T&A screen
Then:
  • Create a new time and attendance
  • Add a break for this time and attendance of 1 hour And set the end date later that the shift end date.
  • I am expecting to get an error message stating that the break end time should be within the shift start and end time.

name: Verify that as a Client User - I can create a normal shift and add a break to it and the hours calculate correctly.
folder: UNO-2038, Uno-2050 - T and A
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Client User. 
When :
  • On the T&A screen
Then:
  • Create a new time and attendance
  • Add a break for this time and attendance of 1 hour .
  • Verify all lines.
  • Check that the Paid and unpaid time has been calculated correctly. 
  • Check a time sheet has been created.

name: Verify  that as a client user I can create a T&A timesheet with a different start and end date and the hours calculate correctly.
folder: UNO-2038, Uno-2050 - T and A
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Client User. 
When :
  • On the T&A screen
Then:
  • Create a new time and attendance that starts late and carries over to the next day, - to carry it over click the is night button on the line.
  • Add a break for this time and attendance of 1 hour .
  • Verify all lines.
  • Check that the Paid and unpaid time has been calculated correctly. 
  • Check a time sheet has been created.

name: Verify Authorize and approve booking permission are mutually exclusive
testScript:
Verify if we can save user with authorize booking permission
Verify a user cannot have both authorize and approve booking permission ticked

name: Verify Authorize booking toggle in Client set up
testScript:
• Able to save client with authorize toggle on
  • Able to enter specific times for authorize toggle and save client
  • Save details for parent client copies over to the child locations
  • Able to edit this toggle individually in child locations if needed

name: Verify Approver creating booking
Verify Approver Edit booking
Verify Authorizer create booking
Verify Authorizer edit booking
Verify approver create booking where there is no Authorization step
Verify if partially filled booking goes back to pending if previously approved and authorized
Verify only number of workers can be edited in completed booking
Verify when number of workers edited in completed booking it goes back to ‘pending approval’ if editor is not approver or authorizer
Verify the button alignment on the T& A screen
folder: Bug Tickets/UNO 2199 Alignment Issues
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a neuven user with T& A permissions. 
When:
  • Adding a user time and attendance. 
Then:
  • On the sub section after the intial creation of T& A screen.  The button to add more lines for breaks, is displaying correctly.

Then :
  • The exported copy of the report show the notes column.

name: Verify if Both is selected, PPS and NI fields are to be displayed
Verify that the page cannot be saved without these fields being filled out, mandatory field
Verify that when logged in as an Agency User PPS column is populated if the information was inputted when the worker was created
Verify that when logged in as an Agency User NI column is populated if the information was inputted when the worker was created
Verify that when logged in as an Agency User, the Worker likely to work in UK/Ireland question is to appear when editing/adding a worker
Verify if UK is selected, NI field is to remain to be filled out
Verify if Both is selected, PPS and NI fields are to be displayed
